data.title: College Programs
data.meta_description: Stony Brook offers an exciting variety of pre-college programs, ranging from genuine hands-on research to credit-bearing summer courses that can jump-start your college career.
data.text:
Stony Brook offers an exciting variety of opportunities for high school students, ranging from genuine hands-on research to credit-bearing summer courses that can jump-start your college career.

Summer Programs

High School Residential Programs

Biotechnology

Computer Science and Informatics Summer Research Experience Program (residential option)

Dental Sciences

Environmental Science in the Worm Lab

Health Professions

International Enrichment Program

Machine Learning and Self-Driving

Oceanography at Stony Brook Southampton

Pre-Law

Robotics Engineering

Simons Summer Research Program

Sustainability in Action

High School Day Programs

Biotechnology Summer Camp

Computer Science and Informatics Summer Research Experience Program (commuter option)

Design and Create Summer Camp

Engineering Summer Camp

Explorations in Forensics Camp

Institute for STEM Education (I-STEM)

Machine Learning and Self-Driving Summer Program

Mathematics Summer Program

Physics Summer Camp

Science and Research Awareness Series (SARAS)

Summer Youth Camp for Computational Linguistics (SYCCL)

Youth Entrepreneurship Summer Camp

IACS COMPUTES!

Middle School Science Exploration Camp

Della Pietra High School Applied Math Program
